transcript:
The person you have called is speaking to someone else.
Hello
Hello
Very good afternoon, bataiye.
Good afternoon, bataiye.
Apne sir call back ke liye schedule kiya tha na aaj ke liye aapne kaha tha ki 12 baje connect kar lijiyega.

Aap please confirm bataiye.
Schedule connect kiya tha sir wahi vyapar vyapar app milta hai vyapar app me login kar raha hu to sala premium membership mang raha hai.
Kya vyapar app se aap login kar rahe hai to kya mang raha hai?
Membership ke liye option de raha hai wo affiliate hai nahi aapka logo jo aap log dete hai apni taraf se.
Hello?
Hello
Ji bataiye.
Sir abhi aap sir abhi abhi aapke paas ek call aayega sir aap please is call ko attend kar lijiyega, theek hai?
Bataiye sir mera matlab payment kiye ho gaya 15 din abhi vyapar mujhe nahi mila.
Kya?
Han han sir abhi aap kyunki wo aapko detail me detail me aapko guide kar denge wo aapko samjha denge aap ek bar please unka call pick kar lijiyega, theek hai? Abhi aapke paas call aane wala hai.
Theek hai sir?
Theek.
Theek.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is unable to login to Vyapar app.

- Customer has not received Vyapar app after 15 days.



Resolution:

- Executive informed customer that they will receive a call.

- Executive said the other executive will guide in detail.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- vyapar app, login, membership, payment
